data.title: TV Schedule & Listings Guide
data.meta_description: A live TV schedule for Turner Classic Movies, with local listings of all upcoming programming.
data.text:
1:30 AM

Germany Year Zero

Feature Film • 1948

A desperate boy takes care of his dying father (Ernst Pittschau).

3:00 AM

Gabriel Over the White House

Feature Film • 1933

Sobered president (Walter Huston) fires crooked Cabinet, becomes leader.

4:30 AM

The Battleship Potemkin

Feature Film • 1925

On the steps of Odessa harbor, Cossacks massacre supporters of a 1905 Russian mutiny.

6:00 AM

Stream

The Fog of War

Feature Film • 2003

Former Defense Secretary Robert McNamara discusses military issues and the Vietnam War.

8:00 AM

Dance of the Weed

Short Film • 1941

A male weed tries to court a female flower by dancing with her, but he is a little too clumsy.

8:09 AM

Cave Explorers

Short Film • 1957

A group of Austrian speleologists explore a newly-discovered cave.

8:18 AM

How to Behave

Short Film • 1936

A newspaper columnist advises two construction workers on the ins and outs of etiquette.

8:28 AM

Lady Gangster

Feature Film • 1942

Radio-station owner (Frank Wilcox) tries to reform gun moll (Faye Emerson).

9:30 AM

Screen Directors Playhouse

Series • 1956

It's a Most Unusual Day

Season 1 • Episode 21

A husband and wife decide to relive their past.

10:00 AM

Popeye the Sailor

Series • 1937

I Likes Babies and Infinks

Popeye and Bluto compete to stop Swee'pea from crying.

10:08 AM

Tarzan’s New York Adventure

Feature Film • 1942

The ape man (Johnny Weissmuller), Jane and Cheeta go to Brooklyn to rescue Boy from kidnappers.

11:30 AM

A Regular Trouper

Special •

A singer must cope with her troupe manager falling in love with her sister.

12:00 PM

Roller Boogie

Feature Film • 1979

Rich runaway (Linda Blair) finds disco roller-skating partner (Jim Bray).

2:00 PM

Class of ’44

Feature Film • 1973

Two pals (Gary Grimes, Jerry Houser) go to college; another (Oliver Conant) joins the Marines.

3:45 PM

Take the High Ground

Feature Film • 1953

Army sergeants (Richard Widmark, Karl Malden) make soldiers at Fort Bliss, Texas.

5:45 PM

Stream

Monsieur Verdoux

Feature Film • 1947

A Paris bank clerk woos, weds and then kills rich women to support his ailing wife and son.

8:00 PM

Bend of the River

Feature Film • 1952

An ex-outlaw (James Stewart) and a horse thief (Arthur Kennedy) lead a wagon train.
